sentences.en: All were equally valuable -- each was differently qualified.
sentences.cn: 人人价值均等, 但每个人又各有所长.

sentences.en: But these names were actually used quite differently.
sentences.cn: 但是,这些称呼的实际使用,却与此矛盾.

sentences.en: Different lawyers may construe the same law differently.
sentences.cn: 对同一法律，不同的律师可以做出不同的解释。

sentences.en: Different people might interpret events differently.
sentences.cn: 不同的人对事件的理解也可能不同.

sentences.en: For me, this uncertainty lies at the heart of what we need to know if we are to understand ourselves and behave differently.
sentences.cn: 对我而言，这样的不确定性就存在于我们需要去了解的内心，即我们懂得我们自己和行为本身是不同的。

sentences.en: He could not see clearly enough to wish to do differently.
sentences.cn: 他的理性还未明理到阻止他.

sentences.en: He did not regret saying what he did but felt that he could have expressed it differently.
sentences.cn: 他并不后悔说了自己所做的事，但觉得本可以换一种方式表达。

sentences.en: I should have phrased my question differently.
sentences.cn: 我本应该换一种方式来提出我的问题.

sentences.en: I would have phrased it quite differently.
sentences.cn: 我本可以把它表述得全然不同。

sentences.en: If I had known it would come to this, I would have acted differently.
sentences.cn: 早知今日, 何必当初?

sentences.en: If I had written the letter, I might have worded it differently.
sentences.cn: 如果换作我写这封信，我或许会用不同的措辞。

sentences.en: It is important to remember that each person reacts differently.
sentences.cn: 重要的是要记住每个人的反应不同。

sentences.en: Men in liquor must be handled differently.
sentences.cn: 对酒醉的人必须用不同的对待方法.

sentences.en: The skeleton consists of differently shaped bones held together by ligaments.
sentences.cn: 人体骨架是由依靠韧带连接的形状相异的骨头构成。

sentences.en: They still get treated differently from almost every other contemporary British band.
sentences.cn: 他们所得到的待遇仍然与当代几乎所有其他英国乐队都不同。

sentences.en: We know the French order things differently.
sentences.cn: 我们知道法国人安排事情的方式与众不同。

sentences.en: With hindsight, we'd all do things differently.
sentences.cn: 有了事后的认识，我们都会以不同的方式行事。

sentences.en: Words written alike are often pronounced differently.
sentences.cn: 拼法相同的词往往读音不同。

words.tran_cn: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的
